name: Chad
description: Advanced features for publishing in the Telegram channels.

releases.name: v3.3
releases.body:
### Added
- Hidden links (only HTML formatting style)

### Fixed
- Links in «About» screen are barely visible with Dark theme enabled ([#4](https://github.com/40PK/Chad/issues/4))

releases.name: v3.2
releases.body:
Changelog:
- Menu bar
- Full multilanguage support
- Code linting

releases.name: v3.1
releases.body:
Changelog:
- "Post write" section default settings
- Loading splash screen
- Settings data structure migrating
- New API method
- Fix "Posts" and "Drafts" sections overflow bug
- Optimization, optimization, optimization...

releases.name: v3.0
releases.body:
Changelog:
- Hide menubar on Windows
- Material design
- Flexible preview area
- "Posts" section (Changing sent posts)
- "Drafts" section (Save drafts of post, change and send later)
- Dark theme
- Migrate from Angular to React

releases.name: v2.0
releases.body:
Changelog:
- Fix bug on Windows platform with scrollbar
- Fix bug with word wrapping in textarea and preview block
- Fix bug with "Send" button
- Fix bug with clearing textarea after sending post
- Fix bug with markdown parsing
- 'Preferences' and 'About Chad' menu items ('Posts' and 'Drafts' are coming soon)
- Multilanguage support
- Menu in sidebar
- Admin bot avatar update by click
- Use analytics

releases.name: v1.0
releases.body:
## Features
- Post preview (HTML, markdown, plain text)
- Sending posts in multiple channels
- Formatting controls (link, bold, italic)
- OS X design 😊
